title.rendered: Pooja Gehlot (Indian freestyle wrestler, Bronze Medalist, CWG2022) speaks her heart out to our girl children

content.rendered: Children from Smile Foundation’s Mission Education centres in Delhi got to meet their favourite sport icon Commonwealth bronze medalist in wrestling Pooja Gehlot. She truly inspired the children, and shared her experiences of living a life full of constraints and working hard to achieve her dreams despite the challenges. The children learnt and enjoyed a lot, interacting with the young achiever.
